contentrichtext.text: '''XHPJ-FM''' (106.9 [[FM broadcasting|FM]], "Classic 106.9") is a [[Classic rock]] [[radio station]] from [[Monterrey, Nuevo León]]. The station broadcasts announcements and commercials in [[Spanish language|Spanish]], though the music played is in [[English Language|English]]. ==External links== *[http://www.classic106fm.com Station Website] *[http://www.mmenlinea.com Multimedios Radio: Broadcasting Company Website where station is a member of.] {{Nuevo Leon Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} [[Category:Radio stations in Nuevo León]] [[Category:Media in Monterrey]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
